This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Per capita sales in U.S. dollars, with a total of 18 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009 to 2017.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2000 to 2007.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2007 to 2009.
